140 class AmoebaPiTorsionForce::PiTorsionInfo {
141 public:
142  int particle1, particle2, particle3, particle4, particle5, particle6;
143  double k;
144  PiTorsionInfo() {
145  particle1 = particle2 = particle3 = particle4 = particle5 = particle6 = -1;
146  k = 0.0;
147  }
148  PiTorsionInfo(int particle1, int particle2, int particle3, int particle4, int particle5, int particle6, double k) :
149  particle1(particle1), particle2(particle2), particle3(particle3), particle4(particle4), particle5(particle5), particle6(particle6), k(k) {
150  }
151 };
